name: Clints
additionalNotes: A Clint is simply a very tasty, very mild, pleasantly aromatic cigar that has an unusual flavor. ENJOY! But more than just being tasty, it's a blend of tobaccos that represent the finest that the Dominican Republic can produce, all hand made into a reliable torpedo shape and finally clad in a very tasty Sumatran wrapper. In short, it's an unusual cigar. Box of 50
